name: Hecahands Gygas
text: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Hecahands Gygas" once per turn. If a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand, except during the Draw Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck, you can Special Summon 1 excavated monster, also shuffle the rest back into the Deck.
